bio:
Redwater Lookout is a man guarding the trapdoor entrance down into Redwater Den. Redwater Den is an underground cave system located in a remote hilly area in the northern section of the Rift. Inside Redwater Den, this lookout's employers sell a special variety of skooma (an illegal narcotic drug) called Redwater skooma.
A woman is helping this man guard the trapdoor entrance, which is surrounded by a half-destroyed abanoned old house. This male lookout and his female companion lookout are secretly thralls of a vampire, who currently resides deep within Redwater Den. These lookouts will not admit to being enthralled by a vampire.
Quotes:
"Hey there, friend. If you're looking for a fix, you're at the right place. Just head on down the trap door."
"I got nothing on me. If you're looking for skooma, head on downstairs."
"If you're buying, go on in. Otherwise, shove off."
name: Redwater Lookout
